question:
Which of the following resolutions/motions/bills require simple majority to be passed in the parliament?
  1. No confidence motion
  2. Money Bill
  3. Removal of Chief Election Commissioner
  4. Creation of one or more new All India Services
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation:
Only 1 and 2 are correct
For Creation of one or more new All India Services, the resolution must be passed by Rajya Sabha supported by not less than 2/3 of the members present and voting and then presented to Lok Sabha. The Chief Election Commissioner can be removed from office only through impeachment by parliament.
